meeting_info.time: Briefing at 11:00 A.M. and the Public Hearing at 1:00 P.M.
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of January 8, 2024, regular meeting minutes

agenda_items.title: Staff Report/Briefings
agenda_items.description: Briefing by HR&A Advisors on an Equity Strategic Preservation Plan draft report - CPC action on removing the 3,000 square foot court ordered demolitions, subsection (i) of Chapter 51A-4.501, 'Historic Preservation Overlay District'

agenda_items.title: 5750 Swiss Ave
agenda_items.description: Request for a Certificate of Eligibility (CE) for a tax exemption on 100 percent of land and improvements for a period of ten years and approval of an estimated $576,159 in expenditures to be spent on rehabilitation prior to the issuance of the Certificate of Eligibility.

agenda_items.title: 408 N Rosemont Ave
agenda_items.description: Request for a Certificate of Eligibility (CE) for a tax exemption on 100 percent of land and improvements for a period of ten years and approval of an estimated $52,925 in expenditures to be spent on rehabilitation prior to the issuance of the Certificate of Eligibility.

agenda_items.title: 6145 Bryan Parkway
agenda_items.description: Request for a Certificate of Eligibility (CE) for a tax exemption on 100 percent of land and improvements for a period of ten years and approval of an estimated $435,213 in expenditures to be spent on rehabilitation prior to the issuance of the Certificate of Eligibility.

agenda_items.title: 1511 MAIN ST
agenda_items.description: Request for a Certificate of Appropriateness to install an internally illuminated cloud sign on storefront of building annex.

agenda_items.title: 5700 CELESTIAL RD
agenda_items.description: A Landmark Commission Authorized Hearing to consider a historic overlay for the White Rock Cemetery Garden of Memories.

agenda_items.title: 610 W JEFFERSON BLVD
agenda_items.description: A Landmark Commission Authorized Hearing to consider a historic overlay for the El Ranchito Restaurant.

financial_items.description: Estimated expenditures for rehabilitation prior to the issuance of the Certificate of Eligibility for 5750 Swiss Ave.
Estimated expenditures for rehabilitation prior to the issuance of the Certificate of Eligibility for 408 N Rosemont Ave.
Estimated expenditures for rehabilitation prior to the issuance of the Certificate of Eligibility for 6145 Bryan Parkway.
